Harold J. Panzer

  1. Alternate Birth Name: [Harry]
  2. Foster Name:
  3. Foster Family: Earl Babbett
  4. Location of Family: Decatur, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  6. Arrival Place: Tekamah, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 13
  8. Date of Birth: 6/7/1910, Manhattan, NY
  9. Date of Death: 11/30/2001, Gordon, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Source: Ainsworth Star Journal, 12 December 2001; Images from Nebraska State Historical Society; Nebraska State Historical Society, Official Government Website for The Panzer Brothers; The Burt County Herald, 26 October 1922; Charlotte Endorf and Sarah M. Endorf. Plains Bound: Fragile Cargo: Revealing Orphan Train Reality (Outskirts Press, 2006), p. 78-85; National Orphan Train Complex.
